ygData.subject: Re:
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Boy this one is going to be popular. But if it stops people from leaving corpses all over the place as free teleporters I guess it s worth it. ... Should
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Sep 24/99, Bard <dabard@...> wrote:
> From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
> - Corpses that are older than 2 hours cannot be resurrected.

Boy this one is going to be popular. But if it stops people from leaving
corpses all over the place as free teleporters I guess it's worth it.

> - Corpses that are produced from a duel cannot be resurrected after 10
> minutes.
>

Should have seen this one coming too. No more risk avoidance in PoF
runs.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
